commits.sourceNew: /** Returns true if the specified field should be returned. */ public abstract boolean wantsField(String name);

commits.author: Robert Muir
commits.sourceNew: /** Returns true if the specified field should be returned. */ public abstract boolean wantsField(String name);

commits.author: Chris Hostetter
commits.sourceNew: /** * Returns true if the specified field should be returned to the external client * -- either using it's own name, or via an alias. * This method returns false even if the specified name is needed as an "extra" field * for use by transformers. */ public abstract boolean wantsField(String name);
commits.sourceOld: /** Returns true if the specified field should be returned. */ public abstract boolean wantsField(String name);
